info.title: GOD CARES 365 API
info.description: DRF schema for Content, Discipleship, Notifications, Progress, Core, Shop, Mentorship

post.description:
Takes a set of user credentials and returns an access and refresh JSON web
token pair to prove the authentication of those credentials.

Takes a refresh type JSON web token and returns an access type JSON web
token if the refresh token is valid.

Takes a token and indicates if it is valid.  This view provides no
information about a token's fitness for a particular use.

get.description: API for dashboard statistics (per-user + global mission stats).
API for mission progress tracking (monthly & yearly per missionary).
Global search across gospel content (posts, lessons, events, mission reports).

post.description: Track a single user activity event.

get.description:
API to inspect user activity.
Admins see all; regular users only see their own records.

parameters.name: activity_type
parameters.description:
* `login` - User Login
* `logout` - User Logout
* `lesson_view` - Lesson Viewed
* `lesson_complete` - Lesson Completed
* `mission_report` - Mission Report Created
* `baptism_record` - Baptism Recorded
* `prayer_request` - Prayer Request Submitted
* `profile_update` - Profile Updated
* `group_join` - Joined Bible Study Group
* `certificate_earned` - Certificate Earned

parameters.name: ordering
parameters.description: Which field to use when ordering the results.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: A page number within the paginated result set.

get.description:
GET /api/v1/progress/me/
 Overview ya safari ya user:
  - list ya levels (Seeker/Scholar/Missionary + sub-levels) na %
  - summary ya masomo yote (done/total/overall_pct)
get.summary: Get overall discipleship progress for the current user

get.description:
GET /api/v1/progress/mentee/<mentee_id>/
 Mentor anaangalia progress ya mentee wake.
get.summary: Get discipleship progress for a mentee of the current mentor
